akn:section.akn:heading: Data exchange standards for improved interoperability

akn:content.akn:p: (a) Designation The Secretary shall, in consultation with an interagency work group established by the Office of Management and Budget and considering State government perspectives, by rule, designate data exchange standards to govern, under this part and part E—
(b) Requirements The data exchange standards required by paragraph (1) shall, to the extent practicable—
(c) Rule of construction Nothing in this subsection 11 So in original. shall be construed to require a change to existing data exchange standards found to be effective and efficient.
